attributes.name: Ice-threaded Longbow
attributes.description: "The icey tendrils are pervasive, piercing into the heart of the bow."
attributes.parsed_description: "The icey tendrils are pervasive, piercing into the heart of the bow."

attributes.name: Icewrought Pike
attributes.description: "Cold to the touch."
attributes.parsed_description: "Cold to the touch."

attributes.name: Icicle
attributes.description: "Pure ice."
attributes.parsed_description: "Pure ice."

attributes.name: Icy Decapitator
attributes.description: "Either the cold will kill you or I will."
attributes.parsed_description: "Either the cold will kill you or I will."

attributes.name: Icy Preservation
attributes.description: "It was ever so important to keep the books and texts at just the right temperature, so they would last forever."
attributes.parsed_description: "It was ever so important to keep the books and texts at just the right temperature, so they would last forever."

attributes.name: Ignited Greatstaff
attributes.description: "Keep your rage in check lest it consume your being."
attributes.parsed_description: "Keep your rage in check lest it consume your being."

attributes.name: Ignition
attributes.description: "Light the world aflame."
attributes.parsed_description: "Light the world aflame."

attributes.name: Illusory Enigma
attributes.description: "... They opened that door, only to find yet another door. But not one to be out done..."
attributes.parsed_description: "... They opened that door, only to find yet another door. But not one to be out done..."

attributes.name: Imbued Hatchet
attributes.description: "Raw magical energy courses through the hatchet, empowering each and every swing."
attributes.parsed_description: "Raw magical energy courses through the hatchet, empowering each and every swing."

attributes.name: Immaculate Life Staff
attributes.description: "That you have survived in this land as long as you have is nothing short of a miracle."
attributes.parsed_description: "That you have survived in this land as long as you have is nothing short of a miracle."

attributes.name: Immolated Quickshot
attributes.description: "Ash spews everywhere each time this old rifle is fired."
attributes.parsed_description: "Ash spews everywhere each time this old rifle is fired."

attributes.name: Immolation
attributes.description: “Set your enemies on fire. Watch them burn.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Set your enemies on fire. Watch them burn.”

attributes.name: Immoral Evermore
attributes.description: "Volley after volley of arrows filled the sky, one for each sin committed."
attributes.parsed_description: "Volley after volley of arrows filled the sky, one for each sin committed."

attributes.name: Immortal Flame
attributes.description: "It is said this sword cuts through flesh as if it were a hot knife slicing through butter."
attributes.parsed_description: "It is said this sword cuts through flesh as if it were a hot knife slicing through butter."

attributes.name: Immortal Handcannon
attributes.description: "Do you want to live forever?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Do you want to live forever?"

attributes.name: Immutable Wish
attributes.description: "What if, just this once, we lifted each other instead of ourselves?"
attributes.parsed_description: "What if, just this once, we lifted each other instead of ourselves?"

attributes.name: Inelegant Barb
attributes.description: "An crude yet efficient offense, wrought of cruel iron."
attributes.parsed_description: "An crude yet efficient offense, wrought of cruel iron."

attributes.name: Infallible Pursuit
attributes.description: “We never imagined being right would be our downfall."
attributes.parsed_description: “We never imagined being right would be our downfall."

attributes.name: Infamy
attributes.description: "The whole world shall know of your sin."
attributes.parsed_description: "The whole world shall know of your sin."

attributes.name: Infused Ancient Coating
attributes.description: USE: Apply to currently drawn weapon. Gives a maximal bonus to damage against Ancients. Lasts for {[ConsumableItemDefinitions.CoatingAncientT5.DurationOverrides / 60]} minutes or upon unequip, whichever comes first. Only one Coating may be applied to a weapon at a time. Coatings stack with Weapon Traits.
attributes.parsed_description: USE: Apply to currently drawn weapon. Gives a maximal bonus to damage against Ancients. Lasts for 20.0 minutes or upon unequip, whichever comes first. Only one Coating may be applied to a weapon at a time. Coatings stack with Weapon Traits.

attributes.name: Inherent Truth
attributes.description: "There is but one truth in this world. We are born, and we die."
attributes.parsed_description: "There is but one truth in this world. We are born, and we die."

attributes.name: Inner Peace
attributes.description: "Now that your enemies are dead, I hope you find peace."
attributes.parsed_description: "Now that your enemies are dead, I hope you find peace."

attributes.name: Innocence
attributes.description: "What is your sin?"
attributes.parsed_description: "What is your sin?"

attributes.name: Inquisition
attributes.description: "We're here to investigate you for crimes against the crown. Worry not, you're already guilty of them."
attributes.parsed_description: "We're here to investigate you for crimes against the crown. Worry not, you're already guilty of them."

attributes.name: Inquisitor's Mark
attributes.description: "Arrows fired from this bow brand their targets with a mark a trained Inquisitor can easily follow."
attributes.parsed_description: "Arrows fired from this bow brand their targets with a mark a trained Inquisitor can easily follow."

attributes.name: Insatiable Great Axe
attributes.description: "More... I need more."
attributes.parsed_description: "More... I need more."

attributes.name: Insatiable Void
attributes.description: "Nothing stops a weapon as fast as getting stuck in an insatiable void."
attributes.parsed_description: "Nothing stops a weapon as fast as getting stuck in an insatiable void."

attributes.name: Insatiable Want
attributes.description: "The longing you feel for one another will be seared upon the world."
attributes.parsed_description: "The longing you feel for one another will be seared upon the world."

attributes.name: In Terror and Sorrow
attributes.description: "He held her and wept. There was nothing he could do."
attributes.parsed_description: "He held her and wept. There was nothing he could do."

attributes.name: In the Quiet
attributes.description: "The peaceful quiet of a dark winter's night belies its danger. Do not give in."
attributes.parsed_description: "The peaceful quiet of a dark winter's night belies its danger. Do not give in."

attributes.name: Invader's Unholy Staff
attributes.description: "These lands shall be consecrated in the name of the High Priest."
attributes.parsed_description: "These lands shall be consecrated in the name of the High Priest."

attributes.name: Invader's Will
attributes.description: "I shall ascend the ramparts or I shall perish. There is no other choice."
attributes.parsed_description: "I shall ascend the ramparts or I shall perish. There is no other choice."
